content.description:
The route is broken in 3 differents vertical parts. 70m, 20m and a final 10m to a belay on a tree. 

The first may be done in one pitch but it might be tight to reach a good tree without simul.

Rappel on trees.



0.5 km after ''Camping du secteur Equerre'', take ''Le Sentier de la chute-du-ruisseau-blanc'' for 0.5 km to reach the waterfall.

Ice screws

P1 (60m) : Vertical sections with good rests, bellay on srews.

P2 (50m) : Long slab with a lot of snow with ice below. Bellay on screws.

P3 (45m) : Many variations (WI3+ to WI5). Money pitch with very nice exposure, bellay on trees. 

Reppel on trees and abalakov



3,5 km from L'équerre shelter. 

Follow the main trail on the east side of the river. P3 is easy to spot from the trail when visibilty is good.

Bushwack (BW2) with a lot of snow in the creek. 20 min

Srews

Possible de faire en une très grande longueur de 70m de corde mais nous avons choisi de le faire en deux longueurs. Gravir la face verticale pour rejoindre une vire d'une vingtaine de mètres. Suivre dans la très joli goulotte jusqu'aux arbres. Plus d'une variation possible Passion hivernale.

Descente en rappel tout juste avec deux cordes de 60m.

---

It is possible to do it in one very long pitch of 70m of rope but we chose to do it in two pitches. Climb the vertical face to reach a slab of about 20 meters. Follow in the very nice gully to the trees. More than one possible variation passion hivernale.

Abseiling just with two 60m ropes.



Directement derrière le refuge de l'équerre au KM 7. Il y a une erreur sur l'emplacement de cette voie sur la carte Sepaq et dans le guide de glace (2023, du moins cela semble être le consensus)

---

Directly behind the shelter of l'équerre at KM 7. There is an error on the location of this route on the Sepaq map and in the ice guide (2023, at least that seems to be the consensus)

screws
These routes are usually less steep and impressive compared of the giants on ''Le mont de L'Équerre'' but they offer good ice with very nice views.
